author: Ben Otto
title: FBI, Indonesian Police Search Yacht Seized in 1MDB Scandal in Bali
text:
BENOA HARBOR, Indonesiaâ€”U.S. and Indonesian investigators searched a luxury yacht Thursday off Bali, seeking evidence the crew had tried to evade authorities in Southeast Asian waters to avoid seizure related to a $4.5 billion fraud case brought by the U.S. Department of Justice.
Police said they would name the captain of the Equanimity a suspect in the case, alleging that he had turned off the automated identification system in waters around Singapore and the Philippines to avoid detection.
